page.title: 14Shops and pubs in Cliffe
page.content: {Shops. There are two shops in Cliffe. One which is outside the survey area is also the{Post Office.}The other called Cherry Tree Stores is the newsagents and sells food and confectionery. The shop in South Duffield is also just outside the survey area, it is a general shop and{Post Office. There is one shop in the part of Osgodby in the survey, it is a food shop, and also has a part selling pet foods. {Pubs. The Public House in Cliffe is called the New Inn. Its bar has been decorated with miner's lamps since the Selby coalfield was developed. The pub in Osgodby is called the Wadkin Arms. Both pubs sell bar meals and snacks.
